Text:
I have been an uploader myself once, i clearly remember the satisfaction i felt when someone thanked me for the upload i did. I understand that you feel the same when you are uploading this series, but at the same time you satisficing all the peoples that are downloading from you guys aswell as the other very very good uploaders i give all credits to you uploaders that doing thing for us. So thank you very much for the hard work with this serie aswell as the brilliant quality! Thank you to CTU also.

/ Mign
